select.title: Select Practice
select.description: Hands-on exercises to implement and customize the Select component.

tasks.prompt: Add a basic Select to a blank page and ensure it is fully keyboard accessible.
tasks.expectedOutcome: A working Select following semantic HTML and ARIA (if applicable).

tasks.prompt: Style the Select to match your design system using CSS variables.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Consistent colors, spacing, and typography shared with other components.

tasks.prompt: Add JavaScript to enhance the Select with interactive behavior.
tasks.expectedOutcome: Graceful progressive enhancement without breaking basic functionality.
